content.raw:
Just noticed that if one imports qtutils with from qtutils import * there can be problems with qtutils.Qt overwriting PyQt.QtCore.Qt. 
So depending on the ordering of imports and if they are imported to the global namespace things can break.
Should we maybe rename the Qt wrapper? Maybe rename it to lowercase qt?
content.html: Just noticed that if one imports qtutils with from qtutils import * there can be problems with qtutils.Qt overwriting PyQt.QtCore.Qt. So depending on the ordering of imports and if they are imported to the global namespace things can break. Should we maybe rename the Qt wrapper? Maybe rename it to lowercase qt?
